newsitem.title: UK: IBCA says affirms Cadbury Schweppes ratings.
newsitem.headline: IBCA says affirms Cadbury Schweppes ratings.

text.p: IBCA, the European rating agency, said on Thursday it maintained Cadbury's Schweppes Plc long-term A plus and short-term A1 ratings.

"Cadbury continues to enjoy a strong position in its two core markets, as world number four in the confectionery industry and world number three in the soft drinks sector, a position enhanced by the Dr Pepper/7-UP (DPSU) acquisition in March 1995," IBCA said in a statement.

"Integration of the North American acquisition is proceeding according to plan and the new businesses made a significant contribution to FY95 earnings in the nine months of their inclusion," IBCA said.
